author: xbalbinus
content: Hey everyone, the Scaling Ethereum hackathon from ETHGlobal is happening in 6 days! https://scaling.ethglobal.co/#:~:text=Scaling%20Ethereum%20is%20a%204,%2C%20zero%20knowledge%2C%20and%20more! Check it out if you're interested with building on Layer 2 / ETH2 projects  & getting connected to developer teammates with mentorship along the way!
